original_title: Origin: Design, Chance and the First Life on Earth
overview: This long awaited sequel to Illustra's landmark documentary, Unlocking the Mystery of Life, challenges the paradigm of scientific materialism and the belief that life is nothing more than the product of blind, undirected processes. With spectacular computer animation and cutting-edge research, Origin examines a question that has baffled science for centuries: How did life on Earth begin?
title: Origin: Design, Chance and the First Life on Earth
